name: godbot
updateMsg1: 5.21 Added custom commands with categories to GodBot! And best of all: no limit (that we'd reach)!
updateMsg2: 5.20 Revamped chatContext.js, fixing all errors and possible missed chatkills due to deleted messages.
updateMsg3: 5.19 Added the >roll [amount] [type] command, which supports custom dice and is better than Dyno's command in every way
description: The 'GodBot' bot code, created for the unofficial Discord server of web and mobile game Godville.
